label: specifiedSupplyChainEvent
comment: A supply chain event specified for this product batch.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.
Specification of the delivery quantities and date/time values in a supply schedule.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
Supply chain goods and materials held in stock.
